Hearts is a trick-taking game (highest value card of the starting suit wins a trick) where players attempt to receive as few points as possible; the player with the fewest points when another player has reached one-hundred (100) points is declared the winner.
In the game, all Heart cards are worth one (1) point while the Queen of Spades is worth thirteen (13) points.
Breaking Hearts: Hearts cannot be played on the first turn, or until they have been broken by being played on a suit that the player cannot follow.
Shooting the Moon: When one player manages to collect all thirteen (13) Heart cards and the Queen of Spades, they receive zero points and the three other players each receive twenty-six (26) points.
